Articles.Content:
Hi! I've been playing KSP for 2 weeks, im so noob, but i love this game.

Im studying physics at university and im bad writing in english, however, i usually read it perfectly.

I live in the southest part of Spain (Canary islands), where the sky is beautiful and clean (Kerbin is better) so i love looking the night sky, and daylight, i play a LOT ksp... Im thinking about making some little mods, so ill be asking in the forums soon haha.

Saludos!
Hi there pilotillo3d and welcome to the forums! We have a Spanish community right here on the forums!

Hi,

Canary islands you said ??? You lucky dog !!!

Welcome.
I just started playing and already added a Nvidia 660 TI Graphix Card to my computer. How's that for being a fan!.... also planning my next MoBo adn CPU purchase to support multiple GPUs.
